data.comment: The match is underway at Hillsborough Stadium.
Goal! Ivan Toney gives Brentford a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 25, Callum Paterson (Sheffield Wed) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Hillsborough Stadium.
Kadeem Harris instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Ivan Toney heads Brentford into a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 30, Great play from Vitaly Janelt to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, Joey Pelupessy is replacing Alex Hunt for the home team.
Fisayo Dele-Bashiru is on a sub for Josh Windass for Sheffield Wed.
Thomas Frank is making the team's first substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Sergi Canos replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
In the minute 58, Thomas Frank (Brentford) has taken off Pontus Jansson who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Mads Bech is the replacement.
Garry Monk (Sheffield Wed) is making a third substitution, with Jordan Rhodes replacing Jack Marriott.
Moses Odubajo (Sheffield Wed) has received a yellow card from Darren Bond.
In the minute 77, Tarique Fosu is replacing Saman Ghoddos for Brentford at Hillsborough Stadium.
The match has come to a close in Sheffield. The final score is 1-2.
